text: Hai ureueng mukmin meunyo tawasiet Meu gata keubit na peue takeubah Ureueng nyang ade beu na dua droe Dalam kawan droeteuh hamba Allah Got pih dua droe ureueng nyang laen Meunyo di jalan gata musibah Meunyo cit mate gata di jalan Tatheun ureueng nyan wasiet tapeugah Tatheun ureueng nyan â€˜oh lheuh seumbahyang Bandua gopnyan tayue meusumpah Meunyo chok gata ureueng nyan geukheun Demi nyo Tuhan kamoe meusumpah Kamoe nyoe hana meuteurimong yum Peue nyang kamoe kheun hana meusalah Beu that beu keunong chedara kamoe Famili kamoe han meupeusiblah Kamoe han meusom saksi keu Tuhan Sabab nyang meunan kamoe that salah Teuntee kamoe jeut ureueng meudacha
